title: Coffee here helps
description: Great coffee, was able to turn coffee into code!

title: Love the album shout out
description: This album helped me put out so much work in a short time.

title: Love this resource! Main lifesaver!!
description: The site literally saved my project. Thank you!

title: Perfect Explanation
description: Thanks for taking the time to explain how styling works for handlebars.

title: Great grub
description: This place was the perfect break from working all that code.

title: Tech Recommendation Savior
description: Thanks for the specifics on NAS recommendations and their storage.

title: Interesting about Arc Browser
description: Going to love testing the Arc Browser in my down time.

title: Love the optimism of this job market
description: Thanks for providing actual ways to get hired for a developer job than just making a random youtube and hoping for the best.

title: Tech adjacent jobs are still tech jobs
description: Thank you for the reminder that jobs that involve working alongside developers is still a tech job and a good way to start.

title: Great study resources
description: Always on the lookout for more resources! Thanks for some new research points.
